text: Charles Andrew Krueger (January 28, 1937 â€“ February 5, 2021) was an American professional football player. He was a defensive tackle for 15 seasons in the National Football League (NFL), all with the San Francisco 49ers. He was born in Caldwell, Texas. Krueger died on February 5, 2021 in Clayton, California from heart and kidney failure at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:American football defensive ends Category:American football defensive tackles Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Charlie Krueger
